com.mysql.jdbc

Class Clob

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.mysql.jdbc.Clob
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.sql.Clob
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    JDBC4NClob

    public class Clob
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.sql.Clob
    Simplistic implementation of java.sql.Clob for MySQL Connector/J
